requirement_tested: Display a homepage with navigation to Menus, Private Poker Room, Events & Promotions, and Reservations/Purchases
user_persona: A first-time visitor curious about what The All-In Bourbon Bar offers.
user_goal: To explore different sections of the website using the main navigation.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens her browser and visits the homepage of The All-In Bourbon Bar. She sees a welcoming hero image and a navigation bar at the top.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the page load and display the header with navigation links.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The homepage loads successfully, showing the logo and a fixed navigation bar with links: Menus, Private Poker Room, Events & Promotions, and Reservations/Purchases.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Menus
narrative_steps.description: Interested in drinks, Sarah clicks on the 'Menus' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Menus' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page navigates smoothly to the Menus section, displaying bourbon and cocktail options.

requirement_tested: Showcase bourbon and cocktail menus with descriptions and pricing fetched dynamically from backend
user_persona: A bourbon enthusiast visiting the bar for the first time.
user_goal: To view available bourbons and cocktails along with their prices.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Bourbon Menu
narrative_steps.description: On the Menus page, Alex sees tabs for Bourbons and Cocktails. He clicks on 'Bourbons' to see the selection.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Bourbons' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The bourbon menu items are displayed dynamically with names, descriptions, and prices fetched from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Cocktails
narrative_steps.description: Curious about cocktails, Alex switches to the Cocktails tab.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Cocktails' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Cocktail items appear instantly with updated content reflecting the switch, maintaining responsiveness and style.

requirement_tested: Introduce the membership-only private poker room with details and access requirements
user_persona: A potential member interested in exclusive amenities.
user_goal: Learn about the private poker room and how to get access.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Poker Room Page
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on the 'Private Poker Room' link from the homepage to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Private Poker Room page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads with an image gallery followed by columns detailing membership benefits and access requirements.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Gallery Images
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by the visuals, Jordan clicks one of the poker room images to see it enlarged.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a poker room gallery thumbnail.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal lightbox opens showing the full-size version of the clicked image.

requirement_tested: List upcoming events and ongoing promotions with dates, times, and descriptions
user_persona: A local resident looking for weekend entertainment.
user_goal: Find upcoming events or current promotions happening at the bar.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Events & Promotions
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks on 'Events & Promotions' from the navigation to find something fun to do this weekend.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the Events & Promotions page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A timeline list of cards appears, each showing event/promotion title, date range, and brief description.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Event Details
narrative_steps.description: Seeing an interesting event, Taylor clicks on its card to read more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an event card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card expands to reveal extended information including sharing options and RSVP button.

requirement_tested: Enable users to make online reservations for tables or private poker room sessions
user_persona: A group organizer planning a night out.
user_goal: Book a table reservation for a group dinner at the bar.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Reservation Form
narrative_steps.description: Casey clicks on 'Reservations/Purchases' to book a table for eight people next Friday.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Reservations/Purchases page and locate the reservation form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A vertical form with labeled fields such as Name, Date, Time, Party Size, etc., is visible.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Date and Time
narrative_steps.description: Casey focuses on the date field to choose Friday and then selects a preferred time slot.
narrative_steps.action: Focus on the Date field, then select a date and time using picker tools.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Calendar and time pickers open and allow precise selection. Selected values populate the fields.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Reservation
narrative_steps.description: After filling in all required details, Casey clicks the Submit button.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out all necessary fields and click the Submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is sent to the backend, and a success message confirms the reservation has been made.

requirement_tested: Allow users to purchase products (bottles, merchandise) directly through the website
user_persona: A loyal customer wanting to buy favorite bourbon and branded merch.
user_goal: Purchase a bottle of bourbon and some branded merchandise online.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Product Catalog
narrative_steps.description: Riley goes to the Reservations/Purchases section to shop for bourbon bottles and merchandise.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the product catalog page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Products are shown in a responsive grid with images, names, descriptions, and prices.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Items to Cart
narrative_steps.description: Riley finds a limited-edition bourbon and a t-shirt, clicking 'Add to Cart' for both.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Add to Cart' buttons for multiple items.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Cart icon in the header updates with new item counts, and items are added to the shopping cart.

narrative_steps.title: Proceeding to Checkout
narrative_steps.description: Ready to complete the purchase, Riley clicks the cart icon to review items and proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Click the cart icon and then the checkout button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Checkout process initiates securely through the integrated payment gateway after reviewing selections.

requirement_tested: Implement a responsive design with peach puff container backgrounds and indian red component visuals
user_persona: A mobile user exploring the website on their phone during lunch break.
user_goal: Browse the website comfortably on a smartphone without layout issues.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Website on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Jamie opens the website on their smartphone and checks how it looks compared to desktop.
narrative_steps.action: Open the homepage on a mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively, with containers having peach puff backgrounds and components highlighted in indian red.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting Across Sections
narrative_steps.description: Jamie scrolls through various sections including menus, events, and contact info.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll and interact with elements like buttons and forms.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive elements maintain proper styling and spacing regardless of screen size or orientation.

requirement_tested: Include a contact section with location, hours, and inquiry form
user_persona: A customer needing help or clarification about services.
user_goal: Send a question about private poker room membership to the bar staff.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Contact Information
narrative_steps.description: Morgan scrolls to the bottom of the homepage and finds the Contact Us section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the footer and locate the Contact section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Section displays embedded map, operating hours, and a vertical inquiry form with fields for Name, Email, Subject, and Message.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: Morgan fills in personal details and writes a question regarding poker room membership, then submits.
narrative_steps.action: Complete form fields and click the Submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form validates inputs and sends data to the backend, displaying a success confirmation afterward.

requirement_tested: Provide user authentication for members to access exclusive poker room content
user_persona: A registered member seeking access to exclusive poker room resources.
user_goal: Log into the member portal to access exclusive poker room content.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Access to Member Area
narrative_steps.description: Alex tries to visit the private poker room page but gets redirected to login since he's not authenticated.
narrative_steps.action: Try navigating directly to the private poker room page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the login form due to lack of authentication.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Alex enters his registered email and password and clicks Sign In.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid credentials and click the Sign In button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully logged in and redirected back to the originally requested poker room content.

requirement_tested: Support dynamic data loading via backend APIs for all content sections
user_persona: A frequent visitor who wants fresh content every time they visit.
user_goal: See newly added events and updated menus without reloading manually.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: When Emma visits the Events & Promotions page, she expects the latest updates to show automatically.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the Events & Promotions page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page initially shows skeleton loaders, which are replaced with real-time data fetched from the backend API.

requirement_tested: Connect backend to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables
user_goal: Confirm that the backend connects properly to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Admin starts the backend server and ensures it initializes with correct database settings.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend service using configured environment variables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server logs indicate successful connection to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json to support `npm run install:all` and `npm run dev` commands
user_persona: Developer setting up project locally for the first time.
user_goal: Set up and run both frontend and backend concurrently using predefined scripts.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Dev runs the unified install command to set up dependencies for both client and server.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in terminal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies install successfully without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Running Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Once installed, Dev runs the dev script to start both servers simultaneously.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run dev` command.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend development servers launch concurrently and communicate effectively.

requirement_tested: Ensure all pages are fully browsable without requiring authentication except for member areas
user_persona: Casual browser just checking out the barâ€™s offerings.
user_goal: Explore public sections freely without being prompted to log in.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Public Pages
narrative_steps.description: Lee clicks through the homepage, menus, and events without logging in.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to multiple public-facing pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Pages load normally without prompting for authentication or redirecting to login screens.

narrative_steps.title: Trying Restricted Access
narrative_steps.description: Lee attempts to access the private poker room page to confirm restriction behavior.
narrative_steps.action: Attempt to navigate to the private poker room page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to login form because the page requires member authentication.

requirement_tested: Include image galleries for menu items, poker room, and event highlights
user_persona: Photography enthusiast interested in visual presentation.
user_goal: View high-quality images of menu items, poker room, and past events.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Image Gallery
narrative_steps.description: While viewing the poker room page, Sam notices a gallery of photos and clicks one.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a thumbnail in the poker room gallery.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Lightbox modal opens with full-size image, navigation arrows, and close option.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Through Gallery
narrative_steps.description: Sam uses arrow keys to flip through several poker room images.
narrative_steps.action: Use keyboard arrows or click navigation arrows in the modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Images transition smoothly within the modal viewer, preserving quality and context.

requirement_tested: Add social media integration and sharing options for events and promotions
user_persona: Social media influencer promoting local events.
user_goal: Share an upcoming event on social media platforms easily.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Sharing Options
narrative_steps.description: On an event page, Maya sees small icons for Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram near the event description.
narrative_steps.action: Look for social sharing buttons on an event/promotion card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Icons for Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram are visible beneath the event content.

narrative_steps.title: Sharing Event
narrative_steps.description: Maya clicks the Facebook icon to share the event with her followers.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Facebook sharing icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Native Facebook sharing dialog opens with pre-filled title, description, and URL of the event.
